answers.answer: I had that with this pregnancy...well more in the beginning than anything. u shuld drink that much water that u dont get thirsty. ur body is telling u need water. drink before ur body tells. keep a water bottle always nearby u. like in bedroom or work.in kitchen in fron of you. so when u see u can drink. in pregnancy like drink drink drink
I'm not diabetic well as far as I know. If that was the case I would also have swelling right?

You might not have swelling. But I would try to stick to water instead of the other drinks mentioned. I've been monitored my whole pregnancy for gestational diabeties and just now got it. I've been thirsty the whole time. Now that I have the GD, I can only drink water or the crystal light type of drinks. No juice, soda, milk, caffinated tea, and so on.If you're thirsty, just keep drinking that water! I have been that way my whole pregnancy, but I am thirsty person to begin with.

question: I am so thirsty it's driving me crazy! All the time if I go more than 10 minutes without drinking I feel like I haven't had water in 3 days. All night long I dream about drinking water. It's not like I don't get enough water I drink 8 to 16 oz an hour so why am I so thirsty????This is a new one that I haven't had with my previous two children. Oh and I'm only 9 weeks.
title: Anyone ever had excessive thirst in pregnancy?
